stdout:
Table	Create Table
promotion_codes	CREATE TABLE `promotion_codes` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `code` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('available','used','invalid') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'available',
  `usedByAccountId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `usedByAccountType` enum('normal','vip') DEFAULT NULL,
  `usedByEmail` varchar(320) DEFAULT NULL,
  `usedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `creditsBefore` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `creditsAfter` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `code` (`code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
